message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.NI 

The paper discusses the vulnerability of IoT devices and proposes analyzing companion apps to identify security vulnerabilities. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and information retrieval (cs.IR) as the authors analyze the apps to retrieve information about the devices. The paper also discusses defense strategies that developers can adapt, which falls under software engineering (cs.SE) and systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper deals with communication between devices, which falls under networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
